term.title: coincidence circuit

item.text: An electronic circuit which produces a usable output pulse only when each of its inputs receives a pulse within a specified time interval.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1538 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
